name: Coronavirus Game (LcompanyGames)
description:
This is the new game about the coronavirus, on this retro arcade game, you will have to atack the coronavirus with alcohol gel, and masks to protect you from been infected. The game is fully translte to Spanish too.

The objective of the game is to last as long as posible, but be careful, every second the difficulty inccrease, and you will have to move and think faster, how many time will you be able to survive?
